results.title: A Little memory
results.creator_credit: Truyen Dinh Le, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Truyen Dinh Le, a refugee himself from Vietnam, tells a harrowing story of courage and determination by his father-in-law to find peace and a better life for his family, away from the war in Vietnam to the safe haven of Australian shores.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Truyen Dinh Le, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Truyen Dinh Le, a refugee himself from Vietnam, tells a harrowing story of courage and determination by his father-in-law to find peace and a better life for his family, away from the war in Vietnam to the safe haven of Australian shores.

results.title: Two hours of christmas cartoons
results.creator_credit: Hughes Leisure Group and Music World
results.brief_description: A compilation of cartoons from the forties and fifties which feature classic stories such as ‘Rudolph the red-nosed reindeer’, ‘Santa’s surprise’, ‘Jingle bell foolin’, ‘Christmas circus’ and a host of other titles guaranteed to generate lots of Christmas spirit.

results.title: Two hands [DVD]
results.creator_credit: Gregor Jordan, Marian MacGowan, CML and Meridian Films
results.brief_description: Set in Sydney’s King’s Cross, 19 year old Jimmy (Heath Ledger) finds himself in debt to a local gangster, Pando, played by perennial Australian actor Bryan Brown, when a simple job goes wrong. Jimmy’s life depends on his locating the $10,000 he has lost. As his scheme to replace the cash is played out, two street kids are enjoying a shopping spree with the original loot. The black humour of the film progressively darkens as the story unfolds. Rose Byrne co-stars as country girl, Alex, who becomes involved with Jimmy and his increasingly dire situation.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Gregor Jordan, Marian MacGowan, CML and Meridian Films

Jimmy’s life depends on his locating the $10,000 he has lost. As his scheme to replace the cash is played out, two street kids are enjoying a shopping spree with the original loot. The black humour of the film progressively darkens as the story unfolds. Rose Byrne co-stars as country girl, Alex, who becomes involved with Jimmy and his increasingly dire situation.

results.title: Turning perceptions
results.creator_credit: Karlene Lynch, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Karlene Lynch found out when she was 21 that she had Turner’s Syndrome. Despite the agony of being infertile and the health difficulties, Lynch has led a happy and inspiring life.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Karlene Lynch, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: What a whirlwind relationship!
results.creator_credit: Lucy Pucci, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Two months into their relationship, Lucy Pucci told her partner that she has Turner’s Syndrome and won’t be able to have children. He stuck by her then, just as he has stuck by her through their various agonising attempts to have children of their own.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Lucy Pucci, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
